entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 this morning. High 22. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 6:09 AM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 20 gusting to 40 this evening then west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 6:09 AM MDT Monday 10 April 2023
